thread.title: BRIEF-China's Insigma Technology gets regulatory approval to acquire assets

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-China's Insigma Technology gets regulatory approval to acquire assets
text:
Sept 18 Insigma Technology Co Ltd
* Says gets regulatory approval to acquire assets, trading of shares to resume on Sept 21
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1NBiIHm
Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
